text: Antoine Pfeiffer (27 February 1940 â€“ 25 February 2021) was a French reformist pastor. He served as President of the Protestant Reformed Church of Alsace and Lorraine from 1988 to 2000 and was a member of the . Pfeiffer died in Strasbourg, France on 25 February 2021, two days before his 81st birthday. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2021 deaths Category:People from Strasbourg
